name: NolaTabs - Git Based Tab Manager
description: This is a chrome extension for managing your tabs efficiently. Behind the scenes, it is based on Git version control system. This makes it powerful because it allows you a lot of flexibility in managing and versioning your tabs. For the average user, it is a simple tab manager that allows you to save and restore your tabs easily. For the power user, it is a powerful tool that allows you to manage your tabs like a pro.
